alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 11:45AM MDT until May 29 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Warm Springs Creek near Ketchum affecting Blaine County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is possible. * WHERE...Warm Springs Creek near Ketchum. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.7 feet, Near bankfull from near Barr Gulch Road to the confluence of the Big Wood river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.8 feet on 04/13/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Warm Springs Creek Ketchum 12.2 11.7 Sun 10 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
